name: Memoclick - CopycatChallenge
description:
FULLSCREEN MODE is recommended, otherwise some elements can be truncated.

Thats's the result of my first GameDev Challenge (make a game in 12 hours) for the theme "Copycat". I spend roughly 8 hours for developing this little game.

In the game you have to memorize the patterns and copy it with simple clicks. Each time, you click the right combination, you get a +1 to your streak counter an every 2 streaks, the level will raise and it will become more difficult.

The concept is nothing new (well known as "Senso" with 4 colours), so i mostly focused on making my first "complete" game with unity in a very short time. :)
